function_description: Extracts a single project from the provided HTML
object_description: A single project object extracted from HTML

name.description: The title or name of the project

company.description: The company associated with the project

profit.description: A number between 0 and 100 representing the profit percentage

investment_amount.description: Minimum or total investment amount required

status.description: Current status of the project (active, completed, pending, etc.)
